meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ann Hefenieder Bob Kitson Barry Rubinowitz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2166.

td.p: Ann Hefenieder, an attorney from Billings, Montana
Bob Kitson, an account represenative from Richfield, Minnesota
Barry Rubinowitz, a writer from West Hollywood, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $18,601)

tr.td: MATH
BROADWAY SONGS
ANNUAL EVENTS
THE BIBLE
FOOD & DRINK
HOTELS BY CITY
